Name: Contemporary Sa Politics And Policy
Description: This module aims to introduce students to political and policy issues in South Africa. Further this module serves to introduce students to theoretical positions within a South African context. This module incorporates political parties, political economy, racial ethnic-gender paradigms and the branches of government. The objective is to inform students that the South African political environment continues to change since 1994. The purpose is to inform students not only of the role of government, but of non-state actors, citizens and the role of the Constitution.
